newsArray.title: Bodo/Glimt Stun Inter Milan: Arctic Underdogs Make Champions League History
newsArray.description: In Summary Bodo/Glimt defeated Inter Milan 2-1 at the San Siro (5-2 on aggregate) to become the first Norwegian club to reach the Champions League Round of 16 in its current format. The “Yellow Horde” has now knocked out major powerhouses, including Manchester City, Atletico Madrid, and Inter Milan in a single fairytale campaign. Forward...The post Bodo/Glimt Stun Inter Milan: Arctic Underdogs Make Champions League History first appeared on Ghetto Radio.
